casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Ishman HARRIS, Sr., Defendant-Appellant. No. 29247

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Nov. 4, 1970. B. Clarence Mayfield, Savannah, Ga., for defendant-appellant. R. Jackson B. Smith, Jr., U. S. Atty., Richard C. Chadwick, Asst. U. S. Atty., Savannah, Ga., for plaintiff-appellee. Before GEWIN, GOLDBERG, and DYER, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; See Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York, et al., 5th Cir., 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 430 F.2d 966 (5th Cir. 1970).
